description: [BackdoorDiplomacy](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0135) has used NetCat and PortQry  to enumerate network connections and display the status of related TCP and UDP ports.(Citation: ESET BackdoorDiplomacy Jun 2021)

external_references.description: Adam Burgher. (2021, June 10). BackdoorDiplomacy: Upgrading from Quarian to Turian. Retrieved September 1, 2021
